response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors. Given its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your portfolio. After careful consideration, I am proposing to sell this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This offer represents a strategic advantage for you, as it is positioned below the market value while still allowing me to realize a fair return on my investment. I look forward to your response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 1350000}
